author: doogie
msg: FIX: service:createAlsoBoughtProductAssocs was run in a
transaction, but on large systems, when fetching all orders and all
bought products, then running createAlsoBoughtProductAssocsForOrder in a
loop, the outer transaction would time out.  Turn off transactions on
the outer layer, and do it all internally.

author: doogie
msg: condition creation logic outside of the try/catch.

author: doogie
msg: FIX: Protect against a null return from getFieldDefs().

author: doogie
msg: FIX: Protect against a null return from getRelations().

author: doogie
msg: FIX: Properly detect if a UNIONED query is being requested.
